data.message: How can I change the security password to be use for temporarily blocked accounts for accesses from new devices?

replies.message: Hi Elena. It sounds like you may have used a feature in a way that could be considered abusive, even if you didn't mean to. Hold tight until you can access the feature again. In the meantime, you can read more about Facebook policies at: https://www.facebook.com/help/116393198446749?sr=1&sid=0nEA9Re5zkLwtYL47. -Sarah

Hi Sarah, I did not no nothing similar and no fuctionlike sending messages or tagging was blocked. Every time I try to access to the account from my home computer. Facebook does not recognize my computer as one of my usual device and blocks the account. To unblock it, I have to insert the security password and now I would like to change it.
